thread.title: Trump to meet North Korea's Kim by May: South Korea

title: Trump to meet North Korea's Kim by May: South Korea
text:
Trump to meet North Korea's Kim by May: South Korea 12:55am GMT - 02:22 
President Donald Trump and North Korean leader Kim Jong Un will meet by May and Kim has pledged to refrain from further nuclear or missile tests, South Korea's national security chief said on Thursday after briefing White House officials on talks between Seoul and Pyongyang. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
